My name is Victor, im sorry but i can't speak german. I'am Brasilian, and whish to congratulate you guys!

Its a pain to lose such important game as world cup, but at least we lose to a great team!

But don't forget, we will seek our revenge in Russia 2018, and I WANT TO SEE YOU GUYS THERE!

Auf Wiedersehen! ( :
